Dash Analytica.subtitle: Election Officer Dashboard
Dash Analytica.description: Monitor voter turnout, run targetted campaigns in specific areas and estimate capital requirements for area-wise campaigns

Smart Home Web.subtitle: Smart Home Interface
Smart Home Web.description: Smart Home Automation System that allows users to control and monitor their home appliances and environmental conditions through a web interface

IoTforHire Website.subtitle: Catalogue Website
IoTforHire Website.description: Website for renting IoT components on short/long-term basis. Catalog, ordering system, and FAQs included

PESU Cafe.subtitle: Snacks at your fingertips
PESU Cafe.description: Designed to provide information on the menu, product availability, and services provided by the PESU cafeteria

Phoenix UAV (VTOL).subtitle: Vertical Take-off & Landing
Phoenix UAV (VTOL).description: To solve poor connectivity in rural India by using Pheonix for delivery of goods. Built a prototype for concept proof and testing configurations.

Notes Web App.subtitle: Simple Note Taking App
Notes Web App.description: We created a note-taking app using the MERN. Users can save notes and delete unused ones using this modern, fully managed cloud database application.

CAPA Website.subtitle: Care and Prevent Anemia
CAPA Website.description: Currently Designing and Developing a full stack MPA for finding solutions to Anemia with interactive UI and a wide range of other functionalities.

Shunya Club Website.subtitle: Math Club at PES University
Shunya Club Website.description: Worked on the website for Shunya Club at PESU. Worked with VantaJS and AoSJS libraries. Respsonsive design with an interactive UI.

Trendy Bites Website.subtitle: Snack Company Website
Trendy Bites Website.description: Developed a SPA for Trendy Bites, a vacuum fried snack company. Form integrations, and smooth animations. SEO Optimised and accessible website.

Secure and Efficient Data Transmission.description: Secure and Efficient Data Transmission using Compression and Cipher Algorithms. A CLI Based project using C.

Constraint Satisfaction Problems with RA.description: Consists of Sudoku and Rat in a Maze problems, solved using backtracking algorithms, with Python and Tkinter framework.

Personal Portfolio Website.description: Static portfolio website to showcase my work and projects. Developed using HTML, Pure CSS and Vanilla JS, with a clean and minimal UI. Deployed using Github Pages

AgriBot 1.0 Prototype.subtitle: Robot Locomotive
AgriBot 1.0 Prototype.description: It's a locomotive that collects soil readings from different areas in a field and provides information to a farmer regarding crop choice and growth.

I-City Mangaluru App.subtitle: Smart City App
I-City Mangaluru App.description: An app based on the theme Smart City. This app basically includes components required for a smooth functioning of an ideal city.

Swachh Bin Prototype 1.subtitle: Portable dustbin
Swachh Bin Prototype 1.description: A prototype dustbin that can be kept in a vehicle. It is a unique bin as it can compress waste added to it and make space for more waste to be added.

Mechanium.subtitle: Omni-Directional RC Car
Mechanium.description: Bluetooth-controlled Omni-Directional car equipped with Mechanum Wheels.

Ideal Home Security.subtitle: Smart Security System
Ideal Home Security.description: An all-in-one model home security system with phone control and live streaming agility.
